original_text: And in the days of Artaxerxes wrote Bishlam, Mithredath, Tabeel, and the rest of their companions, unto Artaxerxes king of Persia; and the writing of the letter was written in the Syrian tongue, and interpreted in the Syrian tongue.
korean_text: 아닥사스다 때에 비슬람과 미드르닷과 다브엘과 그의 동료들이 바사 왕 아닥사스다에게 글을 올렸으니 그 글은 아람 문자와 아람 방언으로 써서 진술하였더라

sentences.original_text: And in the days of Artaxerxes
wrote Bishlam, Mithredath, Tabeel, and the rest of their companions
sentences.korean_translation: 비슬람과 미드레닷과 다벨과 그들의 나머지 동료들이 썼다

sentences.original_text: and the writing of the letter
was written in the Syrian tongue
and interpreted in the Syrian tongue
